channel.title: Posts on Cameron Wise
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cameron Wise

item.title: Simple PHP Blog with login
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Cameron Wise)
item.description: This is a simple blog using PHP, MYSQL, HTML, CSS JS, and Bootstrap 4. I made this project to refresh my knowledge on my PHP and get some experience with hashing passwords.

item.title: DrawTogether!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Cameron Wise)
item.description: This is a Javascript Canvas App using Websockets, Express, and HTML & CSS to create a real time drawing app. Using unique IDs given on connection, users can join their friend’s Canvas and draw together! This app also has a simple chat function to communicate with friends.

item.title: React Todo List
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Cameron Wise)
item.description: React todo list to test my knowlege on React after working with React Native for a bit. This Recat app uses webkit, HTML, CSS, JS, and Boostrap.

item.title: Fire Fighting and EMS App
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Cameron Wise)
item.description: React Native App for Fire Fighting and EMS class at the JACC

item.title: Amazon Web Scraper
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Cameron Wise)
item.description: Another web scraping app using Python with Selenium to get data from Amazon

item.title: HotSchedules AutoPickup Script
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Cameron Wise)
item.description: A Python script using Selenium to check avaliable shifts on Hotschedules.com
